--- delete_as.sql
delete foo as F where F.foo = 1
--- AST
&parser.Delete{
  pos:       0,
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  7,
    end:  10,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  As: &parser.AsAlias{
    pos:   11,
    Alias: &parser.Ident{
      pos:  14,
      end:  15,
      Name: "F",
    },
  },
  Where: &parser.Where{
    pos:  16,
    Expr: &parser.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &parser.Path{
        Idents: []*parser.Ident{
          &parser.Ident{
            pos:  22,
            end:  23,
            Name: "F",
          },
          &parser.Ident{
            pos:  24,
            end:  27,
            Name: "foo",
          },
        },
      },
      Right: &parser.IntLiteral{
        pos:   30,
        end:   31,
        Base:  10,
        Value: "1",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DELETE FROM foo AS F WHERE F.foo = 1
